CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Exposure is a 2023 American psychological thriller film written and directed by Peter Cannon. It stars Douglas Smith, Margo Harshman, Abraham Rodriguez, Ryan Whitney, Alex Feldman, Kevin McCorkle, Gary Poux and Chanel Minnifield.
Exposure had its world premiere at the Newport Beach Film Festival on October 17, 2023, and it is scheduled to be released on digital on July 9, 2024.


Cast[edit]
Douglas Smith as Tanner
Margo Harshman as Nicole
Abraham Rodriguez as Ezekiel
Ryan Whitney as Izzy
Alex Feldman as Charlie
Kevin McCorkle as Pat
Gary Poux as Angelo
Chanel Minnifield as Lily
Production[edit]
In October 2023, a psychological thriller film written and directed by Peter Cannon titled Exposure had its world premiere at the Newport Beach Film Festival, with Douglas Smith, Margo Harshman, Abraham Rodriguez, Ryan Whitney, Alex Feldman, Kevin McCorkle, Gary Poux and Chanel Minnifield rounding out the main cast.[1]

Release[edit]
Exposure is scheduled to be released in the United States on digital on July 9, 2024.[2]

References[edit]


^ Labonte, Rachel (October 13, 2023). "Exposure Review: A Psychological Thriller With Something To Say". ScreenRant. Retrieved April 17, 2024.

^ Kuznikov, Selena (April 17, 2024). "Gravitas Ventures Acquires Psychological Thriller 'Exposure' Starring Douglas Smith (EXCLUSIVE)". Variety. Retrieved April 17, 2024.
